HPI 8072 Lancia Stratos HF 1975 Tour de Corse Winner B. Darniche/A. Mahé

Purchased: 2010
Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/en/line_up/index_8072.php

2nd WRC win for Bernard Darniche.
7th WRC win for Lancia.
7th WRC win for Lancia Stratos HF.

The end of the 1975 season ended on a downbeat note for the works Lancia team. On the Tour de Corse, both factory cars crashed out on their specially-developed Pirelli slick tires. Fortunately for Lancia, the semi-works Chardonnet car driven by Darniche then took up the challenge, and although the Renault Alpines challenged him to the very end, he finally won the event by just 32 seconds.
